I have used melatonin for many years and it is safe, effective, has no side effects and non-addicting. I suggest using small dosages first (in the 1-3mg range).

Melatonin has the reverse effect on me.  Instead of making me sleep it causes me to be so wired-up I am alert all night. I persisted with the treatment on my doctor's advice despite being desperately tired but even on the best of nights I could only manage about 30 minutes sleep. within a short time of taking the melatonin I had a headache which persisted all night.  With all my heart I wished this treatment to have been successful because I have had insomnia all my life.  A normal night of sleep for me is 3 hours and broken sleep at that.

I've been taking melatonin 3 mg on and off for 5 years due to shift work.  The medication wears off within 3 hours, and I'm wide awake in the middle of the night.  Taking it daily caused headaches, stomach cramps, nausea,and depression.

I'd been using melatonin regularly for 4 years with great efficacy for the treatment of insomnia and anxiety. However, a year ago I began experiencing issues with peripheral vascular disease associated with varicose veins (ulcerations and subcutaneous bleeding on my calves, joint pain and stiffness, planar fasciitis and chronic leg cramps).     Within weeks of treating my varicose veins with compression stockings and elevation, I noted increased postural tachycardia, which became debilitating after 3 months (could no longer work). While waiting to see my PCP, I came off the melatonin and both my tachycardia and varicose veins began improving significantly. Three weeks after discontinuing its use, the tachycardia disappeared and the varicose veins improved enough to allow me to go without compressions stockings for intervals of several hours.    Have found nothing to explain the correlation but for a study in European Journal of Phramocology, vol 345, 1 March 1998 (NIH medical journal database), where the authors discuss the presence of MT1 & MT2 receptors (to which melatonin binds) in smooth muscle of vascular tissue and their role in vasodilation and constriction, respectively, as an explanation for melatonin's systemic efficacy.    While my overall condition improved when I discontinued use, I did experience a brief period of cognitive impairment and an uptick in mean blood pressure, the latter of which may require me to seek treatment should it persist. Finally have a follow-up with a cardiologist.
It works.

I've created a "best use" for me that I invented.  More than one Milligram is too much and causes vivid dreams.  The correct or natural dose is about 100 Micro-Grams in your blood stream. With normal 1 milligram pills, this is 1/10 of a pill, so I chew about 1/4 of a pill anytime I wake up at night without intending to swallow it. They aren't bitter at all.  One small piece of pill and some deep breathing, and I'm usually back to sleep quickly.  Chewing the 1/4 pill and holding it in my mouth gets the tiny dose in quickly.

If you find the right one, yes, melatonin can be effective. Possibly even "addictive" (or cause a dependence); I'm tempted to take the "good ones" for afternoon naps!    But the problem is, each brand and dose of melatonin (and possibly each "batch") is SO different. A few brands have worked consistently better than prescription sleep aids for me, but unfortunately MOST brands are either ineffective, or produce the opposite effect desired (eg, I needed a Xanax to counteract the nervous, gittery feelings, then I still couldn't sleep but at least I wasn't jittery.)    One 3mg brand I like is pretty consistent for me (and $3/month! cheap!), but the same brand has a few other doses, plus a "dissolvable" 3mg dose with sweetening added, and of course all the bottles look the same, so I've accidentally bought the wrong ones (or if the right ones were sold out, tried another dose): ALL the other doses of the "good brand" didn't work. And the sugary one gave me the "nervousness" effect.    After a few YEARS of trying melatonin for sleep (on and off), though I have a decent one now, I really think the FDA should be looking at what these vitamin companies put into these pills. At least there should be consistency from "batch to batch" (same brand/dose).    So when you hit luck with a good one, it's very effective. But it really feels like a crapshoot when you open the next bottle. I'd love to put my brand/dose as 5-star satisfaction, but since this review is just "melatonin", I've got to consider the rest of my experiences with melatonin. Mostly positive, but even the few times I've gotten "the jitters" ...why package and sell a sleep aid that makes insomnia a nightmare? It makes it tempting to go back to prescription meds (where the FDA at least has a say).

I am old (71) and also have ADD, both leading to sleep onset disorder. I take Melatonin about 20 minutes before retiring and I find I slowly grow sleepy, sleep soundly for about 6 hours, then less soundly until I get up. I feel refreshed and alert when starting my morning. I have also noticed an improvement in healing time as well as overnight clearing of things like small cysts, sores, even bruises.
wonderful

I started taking 5mg a few months ago. I only used it a couple of times a week at first and it worked fine. This last month however, I took it every night. During all this time I had diarrhea which is not normal for me at all. I didn't relate to the melatonin because I never heard of it causing diarrhea. At first the diarrhea was off and on, I guess because I only took the melatonin twice a week. But this past month taking it every night I got diarrhea so extreme after anything I ate.  I'd take Imodium and then I wouldn't go for two days and when I went again, it was diarrhea. So I googled melatonin to see if anyone else was having this same experience and Lo and behold I saw I wasn't alone. So I stopped taking it and no more diarrhea!  It did work good for sleep but obviously it did not agree with my digestion.

I took this one night only. Within minutes it was like all cylinders were firing at once. Flashes of light and it was like tiny neurons or something were firing left, right and centre in my brain for hours. I swore I could feel them zigzagging through my skull. Couldn't make it stop. Was up all night holding my head to try to make them stop. Never again will I try this drug.
Worked really well at first but once hot flashes and night sweats started, it was ineffective even at a higher dose.

I have been taking melatonin for about 12 years for sleep problems - started at about 300 mcg ~1/2 hour before bedtime, increasing, when effectiveness lagged, gradually to 3 mg (i use the Natrol 3 mg tablet, which was not listed, so I used the Natrol 5 mg for this comment). Added 50 mg Bendryl (diphenhydramine)per night a few years ago and have not needed to change either dose since. I sleep through the night and wake up refreshed but sometimes a bit groggy. A good cardio workout takes care of that. Very important - try cutting down, or better, eliminating caffeine.   I've tried a number of brands of melatonin, but many don't work. I've settled on Natrol, because it works. There are probably others that work also, but I haven't seen any reason to experiment unless/until the Natrol becomes unavailable or stops working. Remember that these are not manufactured as drugs and there is no required test for what's in the tablet. If the first brand doesn't work for  you, try others until you find one. That doesn't mean you will necessarily succeed - melatonin doesn't work for everybody. Try it, though. Start with low doses and adjust as you see how it affects you. Good luck!

For myself, suffering insomnia and PTSD, I had a rather bad experience while taking it for 10 nights as a trial solution. Rather than put me to sleep it woke me up and gave me moe energy in the first few hours after taking it each night my dreams or rather My nightmares were much much more vivid  and memorable, before this i cannot remember having or at least remembering any dreams in the last 6 months. When I did sleep, every third day or so, my sleep was much shorter topping out between 3 and  hours. Then for the 2 days after I stopped taking it I slept about 21 hours a day and was extremely groggy when I was awake (afterwards, that is after the 2 day snooze fest, I returned to my normal insomnia problems.)But the worst side effect, reportedto me by family and coworker, was that while I kept taking the melatonin I was extremely irritable, easily annoyed and angered, not to mention so energized and thinking and talking a mile a minute most of the time when I had to be really alert for work, I guess to compensate my groginess (a sort of adrenaline rush of some kind and I imagine it was like some people feel when on speed or something, or immediately after coming off of it. It got so bad at one point that I was suspended for three days from my management job because I scared an employee and maybe even a few. Which is the exact opposite of what people usually tell me, i.e. I am usually so patient, happy, understanding, forgiving and helpfull.    Anyway, that was my experience of it. As a result I am sure I will never try melatonin supplements ever again for the treatment of my insomnia.
i am so glad that melatonin supplement help me a lot

I started taking this this week a few minutes before bed time. About five minutes after taking, I am falling asleep and have slept for up to six hours straight. I find that when i wake, I am a little foggy, but overall very happy with the supplement.

I think I am not a B***H during perimenopause because unlike most of my friends I am getting enough sleep.  I did the research this stuff is safe unless you are possibly getting pregnant. good

On top of this I began to get very teary...I am on Lithium for Bi Polar 2 which was giving me the insomnia.  Today I decided to go off the Melatonin and I am feeling brighter and did not feel the need to go to bed this afternoon as I did before. Find it very easy to use, use it nightly 10 mg,used to take Ambien for insomnia, but was advised by doctor to try Melatonin instead. Found it works better, I sleep through the night. I feel more refreshed.

I have just started taking the 5mg.(about 4 days now) It does help me fall to sleep. I do still get up now and then, My question is Does anyone else get leg crampsor charlie horses in there legs? Not sure if that is what is causeing the leg cramps.

istill wake up every 2 hours.I never get real sleep My sleep is called broken sleeo

I bought 3 mg melatonin and cut this inn half. That is about 1.5 mg. This is the perfect dosage for me. Im already on other meds for depression and cannot tolerate higher dosages than 1.5 mg. Ive read that its best for people to take .03 mg, because higher dosages cancels out the effectiveness of this drug. So, its best to start out with the lower dosages and then go up as needed. Please keep in mind that very high dosages will reverse the effectiveness. Much luck to those who experience insomnia..

The hallucinations involved watery vision, where everything resembled liquid waves, and complete distortion of light. I've only experienced something similar in my childhood during a shroom trip. As far as I know I'm the only person in my circle to ever experience this melatonin trip effect, and unlike the shrooms it was nonstimulant and basically I thought I was going crazy.     Upped the dose to 10mg the next night just to test, and it was identical, no more or less crazy.    I suppose this works for some people, but I really can't handle whatever it is doing to my mind or body. Like I said before tho, I must be a super rare case.

Return UNopened bottles (within 14 days of order date) or return opened and get 'store credit'. After a few calls, I  got a c.service person who spoke nicely after I stated why I was calling. And I had gone through many types of people to reach Monique. I told her how the first dose make me very I'll and my Dr told me to NEVER take them again after showing her the product ingredients. I can not say that this has been completely effective as I just started taking it, nor can I say that I am satisfied. I'm only a week or so in. What I have noticed is increased bowel movements when I eat foods that are high in fat or just flat out bad for me. I can say that I have noticed a decrease in my appetite. I went to dinner last night with my roommate and got something I routinely get and found myself full halfway through the plate. I wish I had weighed myself, as I didn't before hand, but I'll weigh myself and see where I am this weekend.   What I want to say to people is this: WebMD did not sell you the product that you have. WebMD simply wants to know what you think. They aren't customer Service. If you're having problems with whomever you purchased through ie auto shipping, money being withdrawn from your account etc, and they won't cancel or anything. Contact your bank and tell them it's a fraudulent charge and then contact the Better Business Bureau. If they are a legitimate company they will care about their BBB rating and cancel the auto-ship and refund you your money. Work with your bank. sometimes the auto-ship is explained and people forget to cancel or just weren't listening or didn't read the fine print. There is some consent involved. Also, don't put your personal information here for the world to see ie your phone number. Let's be smart people. I used to work for a company that sold vitamins and the business practices are not always above board, but also there is a responsibility on you as a consumer to be aware of the fine print, and all of the rules.     I will continue taking the product and see how I feel. Good luck to you all.

I AM OVER 70 AND HAVE LIVED WITH CHRONIC SACRO PAIN FOR YEARS NOW, ON A DAILY BASIS G.C. WORKED A MIRACLE. THIS IS ABSOLUTELY TRUE.

column6: DON'T buy the scam!!  This crap does not work. In fact I gained wight, and was always bloated. Taking this made everything worse. Now that I've stopped, I feel much better, and look better. I purchased a bottle of Garcinia from GNC. It is the red bottle for $49.99 if you are interested; but I started taking them two days ago on Monday. i weighed myself monday and I was 190, I weighed myself on Tuesday, i was 187. I weighed myself today and I was 185!!! Needless to say, I will be continuing using this product along with eating fruits and drinking Slim Fast meal replacement shakes twice a day.

I've only been using it 5 days now, but I've already lost three pounds.     Specifically I've been taking the Nature's Design brand, which I found on Amazon after doing some research. I'd been on a reduced calorie diet that left me 10 lbs down, then 3 back up, and after that plateau I needed something to help. I did a good deal of digging before even buying because I'm more than aware of how gimmicky diet pills are...     Apparently you have to get the variety that is 50% of the active ingredient along with magnesium to get the most out of it. The Nature's Design brand comes with 80% and already has the magnesium mixed in.     It does cause some constipation and slightly more frequent urination ( for me at least ), but I've not had anything majorly unpleasant as a result of taking it thus far. I would recommend it to others, but it's not likely something someone with ongoing stomach issues would be able to take without problems.     The blend I have supposedly helps with seratonin levels as well, which I've been calmer the past few days since taking and falling asleep a little easier. Not sure if it's placebo or the supplement. Considering that my job is being sent overseas and the recent anxiety I've had about it, it's been nice to feel more mellow about it.     My daily routine now includes a women's multivitamin, B complex, Zyrtec, and one GC supplement 20 to 40 minutes before my first meal. I have one usually 30 minutes before lunch, and will usually skip a third before dinner. But the instructions will call for more. So far 2 seems to be the safest medium I'm willing to take so far.

I suffer from depression and the side effects were very severe for me. I started taking a product called Pro Garcinia and the main ingredient is Chromium Picolinate. This product intensified the effects of my depression immensely. I also suffered from many strong headaches while I was taking this supplement. I take 300 mg of Venlafaxine XR in the morning every day. This is the maximum recommended dosage and to get through the day to counteract the Pro Garcinia I had to take 3 x 150 mg capsules through out the day. I only had to do this for two days before I realized that there is something not normal in my routine.   I went online to research any side effects and I found that there is a side effect regarding people with depression.   I know it was a result of the Pro Garcinia because that is the only that has changed in my routine over that past week.   Because people do not understand what depression is all about and how it effects people, this has put a very severe crinkle n the relationship I just started with a new lady. My relationship is probably over because people do not understand.   I have written this review in hopes that other people will read it and realize the potential side effect this product has on those suffering with depression.   I strongly recommend that people research what they are about to take and how it may interact with their medication. What I went through was not fun. It probably cost me a great potential relationship.   Do you know what really sucks? I should have done my research before taking this product.

I used the product faithfully, followed instructions implicitly, increased my workouts and ate even better, but did not have any weight loss after 1 month.  Then when my credit card statement came I was charged a whopping $89.95 for this âfree 1-month supply.â  This product  is absolutely worthless, and is sold by scam artists.  It was only after calling my credit card company and then calling the outfit that sold me this worthless product  that I was able to discontinue my âaccountâ with them.  STAY AWAY!

I started using this in April, I changed my diet too.  The effects were needing to drink water all the time, it did stop me from getting hungry, no change in my energy levels and I was very curious if I would put the weight back on.  I stopped using it for 3 weeks, during that time I was on a craving buzz for anything sweet, chocolate etc.  I put this down to emotional eating? So I decided to go back on and try a different brand.  This brand has made me wanting to urinate frequently, dry mouth and not so hungry, as well as lack of appetite.  Still not so energetic too.  Above all I had lost 15 pounds in 3 months.

It is very early days for me taking this, however I have decided to stop reading the reviews as many of the people sound like they are stupid and expecting a miracle.   Like everything, it should be used as part of a habit changing experience.

I took this product as directed and didn't loose anything.  I did change my eating habits but still got no weight loss.  I called the company and they tried to get me to buy more. REALLY? They also interrupted the weight loss program because they shipped my next order at least 10 days after I took my last pills. How can you keep with a program if the very company that's supposed to be aiding you is hindering that process.  They then told me that I could get a tea which they offered for free.  They said this would aid in the weight loss process and suggested it was very effective.  If this is the case why not just send it to begin with?    I had high hopes for this product working but it proved to be very ineffective for me.  Good luck to those of you lucky enough to have this work for you.    Still Overweight!
I don't think I have been on it long enough to tell the effectiveness yet.  I have experienced nausea and headache.
While taking the supplement for 30 days I GAINED TWO POUNDS !
I'm a male just was wondering if this product is good for men to
I have taken it every morning and night for 3 months and have list only 10 pounds. I do feel more energetic.

I ordered the sample product and they sent me another bottle the following month and charged me $89.99--tried to get the money back.  Then they keep sending you emails so you get sick of it and give up.  The company is a scam artist.

This worked great for me! I lost 32 lbs so far and its only been a month!WARNING! read the page, it clearly states ur cardvwull b charged 89.95$ 14 days AFTER YOU ORDER. I've check several sites and they all have similar disclaimers. Also, know all meds won't work the same for everybody as our compositions are different AND THERE ARE SOME FAKES FLOATING! Different manufacturers n formulas work different. Duh. Plus always consult your Dr.
At last a supplement I can use safely

fraudulent claims!  Short trial period  and they charge full amount before trial complete also at $100 a month if you even receive your order. Then if you return you must pay re-stocking fees. if they sell a million units they will make millions in restocking fees for a product that does not work.
I was over 200lbs it was safe and effective and it didnt make me sick
i have been using gc for 3 days and i feel horrible i have extreme back,belly and leg cramps. I also had loose stool i don't recommend this at all.

Hello All,     Ive been taking the product (Garcinia Cambogia- Niwali) and is great!  I'm starting to see results , It helped me reduce my appetite,now I feel  my metabolism is working faster, and surprisingly, I have  lose 2 pounds and starting to get the flat belly I've wanted.      Hannah

I have only been taking 'Orignal Garcinia Cambogia' for 2 weeks. A kind friend knew I was struggling with my weight, saw the advertisement and sent to to me.   Before I even took 1 pill, I searched online to every site I could to get more info on this "miracle drug". I found out you need to drink lots of water, at least 32oz to 64oz to flush out the fat that will be released. I'm thinking maybe that's why several ppl had nausea, headaches, stomach problems, bowel discomfort, and feeling blah...it makes sense to me that the toxins will be released and have to be eliminated with all that water.  I also discovered that some of these labs added other ingredients that weren't disclosed on the label, some of them toxic and dangerous. I'm wondering if the ppl sought out their medical doctors to see if they were poisoned.  After saying all that, I will continue to take the pills, it has diminished my appetite, especially in the evenings, and I have lost inches and a couple of pounds.  My daily routine is to drink lots of water, eat a low carb, low starch diet and walk as much as I can. Good luck to everyone!
i haven't tried it yet , so scared after reading the reviews . Should I try it , its right here on my desk .

I've been taking Garcinia cambogia for about a month and a half now. I bought it at my local health food store but it's the 50% HCA not 60%. The brand is Alive Vitamins. Take 3 500mg tablets / day.  first 2 weeks I felt somewhat noxious all the time but now I feel great. Never hungry, always full of energy and i'm losing almost 1 lb a day. 275 - 235 in 45 days!

Although it has only been 3 weeks using this product I have not lost any weight! I had started an exercise program at the same time so I hoped using this supplement would be a boost to losing weight. My concern now is that I have been retaining water and my legs have balooned since I have started using the capsules and I have to ask if this might be a side effect? I was really anxious about using this product and have been disappointed so far. I purchased my capsules through Bio Health on the internet. They are packaged as 1000 mg  with 60% HCA

I have been battling with my weight for a while. I was at a dead stop so then I decided to try Garinia Cambogia I followed directions and I have lost 15lbs in a month. Very happy I tried this product and will continue to use it until I get this weight off. I started out with Garcinia made by Whole body Research but this month I changed and I am now trying Garcinia Cambogia from Abundant Health I will let you know if this one works as well as the first one I tried.

Where are the brands we have picked on here? I can't find them :( If I don't know what brand these people are talking about,how are the reviews supposed to help us make a decision on the one we want to take?

I decided to try and increase my chances at losing weight this year and wanted to find a good, healthy supplement to help aid in my weight loss goals.    I came across MNC Premium's Garcinia Cambogia 1600 on Amazon and I have to say that I'm now two bottles in and seeing some great results for a change!    It's a large dose of Garcinia Cambogia so I don't want to take it forever, but I have lost all cravings for food while using it.  I consciously eat better knowing I have a goal in mind, and Garcinia Cambogia 1600 is helping me get there!
Waste of money
I took it as directed by the supplement. Store consultant.  I lost no weight nor loss of fat as stated.  I had no response as well from the garcinia I ordered on line

I took the Garcinia with Green Coffee Bean for one month now, gained 8lbs. Did not changed anything in my diet though, except cut back on sugar, and did not exercise too. Had zero side effects! Feeling great! Will try one more month with exercise, and low-calorie diet with a hope to lose some weight. Have to mention, that I am a healthy eater, never tried junk food, soda, etc.. Have PCOS, which makes it very hard to lose weight; after trying gym for 6 months for 4 days a week for 2-3 hours intensive workouts, decided to try garcinia and coffee bean, with a horrible result of gaining more weight :( but I don't lose my hope yet!
I have tried two different brands of Garcinia Cambogia & neither one worked. Dr Oz and Ophra lied about this product.  I want to know which brand Oprah used?
column14: 65-74 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Other

column6: It gave me loose bms. I could not use it.

column6: constipation increased appetite and weight gain

I have been taking GC for quite a while and have lost 20 lbs. I am severely diabetic and had not lost any weight for YEARS, so I hope to loose more weight but at present I am dealing with tremendous gas and flatulence and am now wondering whether I should continue taking it. I wonder if anyone else is having this problem or what may be the cause and how to deal with this problem.
gained 10 pounds while taking this herb

Lost 35 lbs in 7 weeks- some stomach discomfort in the beginning but now its ok. Do research and buy only products that contain 60% or more HCA. Dont overpay- go on amazon and do a search for products and read reviews. If bad stomach cramping persists, use a mild cleanse- this is what made my cramps disappear. My "cocktail" is this- 2 garcinia pills, 1 green coffee pill, 1 raspberry ketone pill, and 1 blue Hawaiian cleanse pill, 2x's a day. I have type 2 diabetes and my average blood suger is 88 when i get up in the morning- thats amazing considering it use to be 130-170. Also eat a well balanced low fat and low "processed" carb diet. BTW, i use naturewise products- the brand is not listed in the drop down menu.
Just started
What a joke! I actually gained weight. Don't waste your money.

The thing about this product is that you'll never see a negative review about it. Well, I'm here to tell you that it's a scam. I can speak from personal experience that this product in fact, isn't what it's set out be. They say you can keep on doing everything the same, no changes, no exercise and still lose weight. It's a lie! I've been on this product for a month and have actually gained weight. I thought I could keep on doing what I was doing and still lose weight, as the product says. After about 3 weeks of using this I realized it wasn't true. People, the only way to lose weight is to get off your butt and watch what you eat. There is no magic pill, and there never will be!
losing weight very fast
I have been on it for about three weeks and haven't lost a pound.

As usual it is not a MIRACLE in a jar. Been dieting for three week with taking the supplement have lost 11 pounds. BUT I worked to get it off. The last week I resumed normal eating and nothing. My concern is I have fibromyalsia and this sets off terrible pain in the tendons joints at the connective tissue...am still going. My sons both started also (18)nothing. We are taking 1650mg three times daily as recommended. went naturalpathic with nutrigold.

So far I have been taaking Garcinia for 2 months. I am down 27 pounds. I believe the supplement helps a little but the person taking the supplement has to do the work.   I am following a diet and exercise program to be able to get my weight under control.   No side effects as of now so I could say I am happy with the product.
This is the end of day one. I know this pill doesn't have stimulants in it, but I am having tremors, palpitations and severe nausea.
Doednt it cause liver problems. Ive seen that on other sites.j green,M.D.

I would not recommend Original Garcinia Cambogia. I started an exercise regimen with also eating a 1300cal daily and added this in hopes it would speed up and get me better results I also have hypothyroidism and am on medication for that so losing weight is difficult anyway. I started with 1 tablet before breakfast and noticed i was very thirsty and drinking 64oz if water daily with no relief. I also felt dizzy and couldn't figure out why. At night hard time sleeping. I upped it to 2 in am instead of 1 at night thinking that would be better so I could sleep. As soon as I took the 2 together within about 40 minutes I had an accident of #2! Very OILY! That has never in 43 years happened to me only thing that has changed is taking the product. I have lost 10lb already but not sure if that is just the calorie and right food choices and exercise that has done this. Do not buy Original Garcinia Cambogia. I see alot of the same complaints for other people. P.S. It messed with my cycle as well one month no period next month 2.
I have been using this for a month just to give it a really good chance.    Absolutely nothing I did gain a few lbs.

I am 61 years old, have metabolic syndrome, and have a very hard time losing weight.  This treatment seemed to work best after using it for about a month; then, areas which never seemed to lose fat, started to "thin out".  Weight has dropped by at least four pounds in 6 weeks.  Food cravings are less, and appetite has noticeably decreased.  I am convinced the garcinia cambogia has done it, although all the water it takes to swallow the huge capsules has probably helped, too!
7 days and the belly fat is going and going ...love it
I had major side effects. Abdominal pain. Excessive weight gain. Headaches. Muscle ache. I gained 22 lbs of water. I drank eight glasses a day while dieting. Those pills are dangerous
HEADACHE

Fast heart rate. felt like I was going to die. The kind I took was from walgreens in park forest il.You need to give more info. on side effets.I was taking garcinia cambogia complex Garcinia RX.I takin the capsules for one month. I thought I was going to die. I still have some left from the new bottle I had brought. I had purchas two.

I have taken Garcinia Cambogia for about 6 weeks. I've lost about 5 pounds without much change in lifestyle. However, I have had extreme diarrhea and stomach discomfort, and I am not sure if the weight loss is due to my stomach problems. I have to be careful when and where I eat, because the loose bowels and compulsion to "go" can come upon me at any time.

I ordered mine through groupon and it's one of those deals so I have 3 bottles for $20.  Yes, they have 60% HCA.  I took it for about 3 weeks and I noticed some weight loss but it was because I drank so much water to keep the pills down.  This helps with reducing my intake however I'm not quite sure whether the fat blocking really works.  I lost a few lbs from eating less because my appetite was ruined from all the water I drank.  I stopped using the pills after 3 weeks, and noticed that I can continue to lose weight from drinking lots of water and eating smaller portions.  Folks save your money and do diet the ole' fashion way....diet and exercise!
Took for 3 months..lost NO weight and go to gym 3-4 times a week and have lost inches but gained 3 lbs..Have headaches during night and feel weak at times..stopped taking today.

Overall it is a good product specially I would just want to maintain my weight without exercise due to my working schedule and the gym environment. However? My extra free bottle don't come to me but the Customer Service insisted it was send when I ask. What is this about? Offer put up and consumer get more but? FREE Bottle never come and my sis and I have to share each 1 bottle. Never order again!
I'm a huge fan o Miarcle Garcinia Cambogia
I never lost an ounce  I gained weight
Useless.  It's a scam and they put you hold when you try to cancel the orders.
As reccomended for weight loss I took 6 pills a day. Which is difficult to remember but I did.  No weight loss or appetitie supression at all.  Totally ineffective.

The stuff does not work. Matter of fact I gained weight. Anyone who says they lost weight would have lost it without it because if you eat less, exercise more the weight comes off.  It causes nausea. Don't waste your money.

My main reason for trying this is that I really want to lose some stubborn belly fat. I've heard a lot of mixed reviews. Some good, some bad. So after careful research I decided t to try. I ordered online. There's the recommended 60% HCA with potassium to aid in absorption as well as some calcium. Nothing else. I've only been taking for about 2 weeks and havent had any weight loss yet. However, I have noticed more energy and it does help with appetite suppression. As far as eating habits, Im eating smaller portions and trying to eat healthier. I have also began incorporating cardio and weight training into my daily routine to see if i can get better results. Im not getting any of the "bad" side effects that a lot of people are reporting such as diarrhea, nausea, headaches, etc. I know that when i researched GC, a lot of brands have added ingredients so that may be the cause of some of those side effects. My advice would be to do your research before deciding if this product is right for you, and purchase from a reputable brand. I believe this product will help me so will continue until my bottle is used up and will come back here and give another review. Good luck to you :)

Its easy to use. 2 capsules, 30 mins before each meal, but not really noticed a massive difference. Im not overweight just wanted to lose a few pounds and shape up for the summer months. I did so much research and am now thinking this DOES need to be taken with a Nuovo Cleanse or something that keeps one regular. Coming up to 2 weeks have had constipation and difficulty passting stools and I have  just been in agony on the loo with stomach cramps. So painful my legs were like jelly.  I definitely think it might work but you gotta have a colon cleanser to take with it.
Have not lost one pound of weight but have significant rise in blood pressure.

I would NEVER recommend this to anyone. My first couple of weeks I saw great results. Then by week 3 I had increased cravings and appetite. I ended up gaining weight on this product and had terrible nausea. Once I stopped taking it my nausea was gone and my appetite was back to normal.

I exercise less because of my nature of work, so I took Garcinia Cambogia, when I saw it on Dr. Oz show, and did read all the articles and review before I decided to try it, so I finished the one month supply and I did not loose a single pound, even I follow the instruction the best way to take it, and I do walk 1 hr, everyday and did not loose even 1 lbs. on my weight, so I did not buy it again, waste of money.
Never experienced such bad cramping, stomach ache, diarrhea, bad heart burns, will have to stop using it.
suppresses appertite

I have actually gained weight on this as well as having a bloated looking belly. I have been getting headaches and stomach aches, today being the worst, I actually felt sick from the pain. Hunger pains are also much more intense. I purchased online from BioHealth....foolish mistake...I,m out one hundred bucks . I can't wait to start feeling better and I will not be taking this (whatever is in the capsule) any longer.

i just wanted to let people know that the side effects are real and i got each an every one of the side effects.. headaches, stomach issues and nausea. I even felt like I was going to faint. I drank lots of water and exercise along with eating healthy and didn't see a difference.  After the second week that's when the side effects started I have stopped taking the pills and feel great.
it really control my appetite and i notice a decrease in my blood pressure.

After the 3rd day taking Garcinia Cambogia, I experienced diarrhea.  I note so many others reported constipation.  Initially, I was so ready to drop 60+ pounds that I continued taking the product for 2 weeks. Diarrhea is now more severe with blood.  Company has already charged the next supply to my credit card before 14 days of initial order.  Took 4 phone calls to cancel and now I am in a dispute over credit card charges of about $190.  SCAM! I bought the 100% pure Natural Garcinia Cambogia
This product did not work for me at all. I have insulin depedant diabetes and tried it following the directions for 30 days, lost no weight at all.

Initially I took 2 capsule (500 mg 50% HCA) and in the first few weeks lost a pound or two and saw my appetite decreased and energy slightly better. No real discomfort but did become very regular! So after the 1st bottle I found out that Dr. OZ recommended 1600 mg daily for 60% HCA products. but since I already bought 6 bottles I just increased the dose to 3 capsule 1 before lunch and two before dinner, at least 30 minutes to give it time to create the enzymes that block fat and decrease hunger. Scientists need to put more products that effect "good" enzymes into the marketplace ... but certify their potency!

Went into this with an open mind. Read reviews, side effects, etc. I'm not a diet pill taker and the only reason I gave this a chance was because it was all natural. No caffeine, etc. I experienced some weight loss but only because after the third day I experienced terrible heartburn and nausea, so I didn't eat much for two days. Don't know if I can blame it solely for the heartburn as I ate some things that could contribute to it, it's just that I almost never get heartburn (maybe once a year). So I have stopped taking it. My appetite seemed to diminish when taking it before meals, but could be a placebo affect. Not saying it doesn't work, just not sure it's right for me.

When I started to take GC, I felt stomach cramps, nausea and now I am always constipated. I haven't lost weight and feel even stronger hunger pangs. I need to stop because my digestion is all upset and hope I'll get my money back. The only positive is feeling somehow more energetic  I just realise, the brand I'm using is not even listed below. It is called DC Fulfillment - Garcinia from St George UT 84791 USA. Can you check them out?

No results during the first two months of taking this supplement.  But in the third month a noticeable decrease in waist size became apparent. Waist size reduced by two inches. Weight stayed almost the same I believe because muscular tone increased.

I have taken this product fairly consistently since July along with a low carb diet and exercising 5X a week. I like it for two reasons. 1) I see it as a "safety net" when I am not able to eat low carb meals or indulge in a "cheat meal." 2) My diet and exercise would of course help me lose weight, but I feel that the Garcinia has been an added boost. Where before, I may have lost 1-2 lbs a week, the Garcinia can increase that to 2-4 lbs. In the past 7 months, I have lost 45lbs, and I am very pleased as I near my goal, how I have been maintaining my progress. I have never used the Garcinia alone (without diet & exercise) to try to lose weight, and honestly I would not recommend it even though some say it works. I would recommend using it as a back up for when you do have an occasional cheat meal.
column14: 19-24 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: I am noticeably bloated!!!! Help. Also have been getting headaches.  I will be returning the product. :(

Saw this natural fruit extract on Dr OZ (he recommends). Purchased from Puritans Pride - lost 9 lbs in 3 1/2 weeks.   I have no side effects and I do feel full sooner and can eat less without hunger pains. I am also eating better. Rachel Ray used this to help her lose weight and look at her now!

BEWARE! This does not help with weight loss.  Read the small print/terms and conditions...they automatically charge your credit card even though they advertise free bottle for shipping!  Read..I fell scammed!
extreme stomach cramps
Just started I want to see side effects'
It decreased my appetite briefly.  I still had cravings even after taking the pill.  I took the pill twice a day.  I even gained weight.

I ordered a bottle of this because I could get it for just the cost of shipping. When I received the bottle of pills it came with directions about exercising and watching what I eat, so I didn't have much faith it it and didn't even open for over a month. Then came another bottle in the mail with a receipt where they deducted $86.00 from my checking account. About that time I got a horrible case of the flue/cold. After about two weeks of sickness I had lost 10 lbs. So after I started to recover I thought well as long as I've paid $93.00 for two bottles of pills I might as well take them. I took 3 pills a day as directed, and ate as I felt like eating. My only exercising is walking to the mail box, and the refrigerator. a couple of weeks later I weigh myself and found I had lost another five lbs. I still wasn't sure it was from the pills, but two weeks later I had lost another four pounds without ever changing the way I ate. After another week on the pills and I had lost another 2 pounds, and that's where I am now. Even though I feel that I was bamboozled with the price; loosing 13 pounds in six weeks without dieting, plus the 10 pounds previously made 23 pounds that I have lost, and I feel great. I would say that two bottles of these pills are not worth $93.00, but it's worth a try if you can get them for say $24.95 a bottle. The company is called, "Garcinia Cambogia Pure Select-USA

I took garcinia for about a month. No weight loss: my stomach felt bloated all the time: no change in my diet. Returned whatever was left to the company I ordered it from. I was refunded the full amount.
ive lost 30 lbs since I started taking it, granted, I am also working out 6 times a week and watching my diet, but Ive only been doing this for 6 weeks.
NOTHING HAPPENS ..... FAKE SCAM .....

After taking the first tablet, I started have nausea.  The sensation went away but, I continued to feel very fatigued. I got the same result after taking it the second time. I discontinued the product.
Taken for weight loss of 20# +-,have lost 3# over 3wks,side effect has been a reduction in blood sugar.
this is my second attempt trying a different brand.  Not seeing any significant weight loss or changes in apppetite
taking for 60 days with no results
Got a vaginal yeast infection about 1 am after starting-  I relate this directly to this supplement

I've been taking GC extract for just about a month now. I've been eating a well balanced diet & exercising regularly. I'm losing 3-4lbs a week. That said, I have a lot to loose(80lbs +/-) & I honestly can't say what portion of the loss can be attributed to GC. Important to gage by fat loss %. Since I've been keeping track...bout a % a week.     I will continue taking GC For this reason alone. My energy level & state of mind has been so F'ing incredible. Best in years & compared to other times I've been living well. I have heard serotonin levels increasing could be a side effect. Who knows, but I feel great.    Had to share.

I've been alternating between tablets (pro-nutra brand, ultra concentrated garcinia 1500mg/50% HCA) and chews (HNS brand, 500mg/50% HCA)..the first day I tried product I felt the biggest difference. It really seemed to decrease my appetite alot, also noticed it made me feel an overall sense of well-being. And something weird - I felt as though when out in the cold weather, it didn't feel as cold, like it had an effect on how my body senses tempurature changes. No negative effects at all for me.    But the 2nd & later days, it was as if i'd built an instant 'tolerance' to it. Had been thinking it was the perfect weightloss supplement for me. It still helps in my opinion with appetite. Still no negative effects - just wish it would've continued working as well as the 1st day I tried it! I quit smoking & am on lowest of nicotine patch; the 1st day on garcinia I didn't even need my patch! Thought if it continued working so well, it might even help me to stop using them..

I have not experienced this yet, but my friend at work has. In 2 months he dropped 4 pants sizes and he hasn't changed his diet yet. He still eats fast food and other junk here and there, he has 2 jobs and hardly gets time at home to cook. He's never been extremely obese, but he has been a little overweight. I've definitely noticed a difference and he says that all he's been doing is taking the liquid extract under the tongue, 2ml drops. No eating habits changed, no exercise habits changed, he claims he has tons of energy for the day and his two jobs, and his pants aren't fitting anymore.
EACH OF 3 PILLS TAKEN HAS GIVEN ME INTENSE PAIN AT MY RIGHT SIDE, DUE TO GAS I THINK--INABILITY TO DIGEST THIS FRUIT RIND SUBSTANCE ALSO CONTAINING 50 MG OF CALCIUM.

I bought "Pure Garcinia Cambogia".  When I tried to return them they said their guarantee is for 30 days, starting with the DATE OF SHIPMENT, and must be RECEIVED by them by the 30th day.  That means, you've got about 2 weeks to try it to see if it works.  In addition, this information is in a special place on their web site and is NOT given to you before you order.  Boo, hiss on Ketonic Labs.  I will not order ANYTHING from Ketonic Labs.
column14: 75 or over | 1 to 6 months | Weight loss

column6: I started taking Garcinia Cambogia a week ago ask well as a low carb diet. I have lost 6 pds now I realize that most was water weight and low carb if done right will melt away the weight,however I have done low carb in the past and lost the 1st week 2-3 pds I doubled the loss of what I would normally would lose by taking GC  another thing I noticed where I lost the weight was indeed in my stomic area. My appetite has decreased to the point I almost have to make myself eat. I have had no negative side affects. There are so many negative reviews it is a shame it does not work on everyone but it does work on some people if taken the right way and with a good brand. I recommend you go to a vitamin store and buy directly from them versus online. Again it is a shame so many people can not benefit from this but some can and I recommend to at least try it for yourself before you automaticly blow it off as a scam. i belive it will totally control your appetie that I'm sure of as far as burning fat time will tell but I feel good about this product and will continue to take it.

I haven't been taking this product long, but decided to take it based on a) to see if it really work b) to lose a few nagging pounds of belly fat and love handles.  I already eat healthy and just became consistent with exercise .  In the first week I noticed decreased appetite and I felt a little more energized.  I am taking Thin Tab 3G that contains green coffee bean, garcinia cambogia and green tea all combined in one tablet
Question I need answer did anyone end up with acid attacks at night time and be woke up with acid by taking Garcinia Cambogia?

Just started so I cannot discuss weight loss yet but being made to drink water before each meal tends to kill appetite and slow snacking. No bloating or upset stomach.Will report back. Pill might have been easier since the powder is very messy. Also I suggest buying on Ebay for a fraction of store cost. Check the description in ad for percentages.  I am only taking it twice a day. Homeopathic Labs is the maker on the label.
This product has not done anything for me at all. also this company has lied to me and tried to charge me for a free trial and refuse to even work with me.   DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT

This product did Not work for me I lost 8 lbs in one month,and gained 10 lbs in 2 weeks,so I stopped taking it, now that I don't take it I feel sick all the time, I eat less have no energy and still don't loose weight. There is a lot of hype on this this n in my opinion it made me worse. I feel like I have to throw up all the time. I was wondering if anyone else experienced this as well.
Since taking this product my stomach has been bloated and hurts. I have had great difficulty having a bowel movement, almost to the point of being impacted.

I couldn't give good ratings yet since I just started. After reading these reviews I decided to get them from Walmart. What brand works? I got purely inspired. I also incorporate cardio and weights into my routine with a smart diet. I have already had some GI issues, usually about 1-2 hours after taking the pills. I am chalking that up to detox. Any other tips?

After 2 weeks saw a little difference in belly fat. However did not lose more than 1/2 a pound in the 2 & 1/2 months that I took this supplement and actually put on an additional 1 & 1/2 pounds overall. Did not see the results as claimed on the Dr Oz show. Dr Oz has shown too many weight loss miracles on his show, I doubt any of them work. I have stayed on my regular dies of salads fruit & veg asnd a little chicken throught. I will stay with my usual eating habits and my exercise on which over a one year period I lost 15 pounds.
I took the free bottom I gain weigh.
Generally gives sensation of fullness not particularly effective because metabolic changes require more measures for weight loss than his nutrient extract offers.  Slight headache some nausea.

I have been taking this for 2+ weeks. Purchased the Garcinia Cambogia at our local Vitamin World to try and get the best product.  I purchased Garcinia Fusion (90 veggie capsules).  I haven't lost 1 pound even though I am eating much less.  Haven't noticed any of the claims heard on Oz and read on-line.
Well I gained lose stool and many trips the  bathroom. Worthless product.

I eat well and exercise 5 - 6 times a week. However,  as I've aged it became more difficult to stay toned and fight belly fat.  After one month on this my stomach was significantly flatter.  I dropped a jean size and my legs were definitely smaller.  I didn't exercise for the first 3 weeks on this because I wanted to test the claim that huh you could lose weight without having to change your eating and exercise habits.  I lost fat without trying.  I'm exercising again because I want muscle tone, but am not changing my diet because it was already pretty healthy. I would recommend this supplement to others.   I think you still have to eat right and have some degree of physical exertion,  but it does do what is claimed.
There is NO change in weight loss. In my opinion, it is a scam.
I cannot review this yet as I just started but fir all of you who had the best results why don't you share the brand names with us so we know what to get

Looking to lose about 10 nagging pounds. Took product as recommended and haven't seen any changes in my appetite or weight. The only positive is that I slept deeper at night.  I wouldn't waste the money for additional bottles. Used the product advertised with Oprah's weight loss. (Original Garcinia Cambogia)

I have taken garcinia by Rightway found in Gnc and it helped with my depression but did not lose any weight.  Recently found it has caused mt migraines and post menopausal bleeding.  Leave this product alone!
I have taken this product for a year, I did not lose a pound but it helped with my depression.  I just discovered it is the cause of my migraines and post menopausal bleeding.  Don't take it!

I have been using this for about 6 weeks now. So far, it has drastically helped cut back my appetite and I have lost 16 pounds. Fellow users, one thing to keep in mind.. Although the advertisements say "no exercise or diet required", I have found that WITH exercise and healthier eating this product is extremely effective. Get your butts off the couch and go to the gym. You will see and FEEL the effects of this product!
ExpErienced drowsiness and lack of energy. Only took for two days, had grasses and incReased appetite. Also had severe stomach cramps and gas three days after last taken. Would NOT recommend!!!
I have not lost any weight or inches. Just reduced my bank account.

While the supplements decreased my appetite - I lost 5 lbs during the holidays without even trying and went on a 2 week vacation - my blood pressure and heart rate when over the top.  3 days ago, my blood pressure was at it's highest - 160/101 heart rate 97 - I finally freaked out.  It has been going up and I thought it was menopausal symptoms because I had researched the side effects of the product which were nill.  Well I finally decided to garcinia cambogia just to see.   2 days later, my BP is back to 120/70.  I'm bummed as it was working.  Dosage was 2 in the a.m. and 2 in the p.m. each being 1500 mg a dose. Try it but PLEASE check your blood pressure in the a.m. and compare it to the p.m.
Only needed to lose a few pounds. Took as directed, lost no weight, experienced stomach pain and mood swings these stopped after I quit taking. Would not waste your money on this product.

I find this product very effective, but I did my research ahead of time. There are many brands out there and you need to find one that is 60% potency and take at least 1600 mg a day and take the pills 30 to 60 minutes before hand. My son had been taking 10% and right before meals and he ended up eating more than he should and gained weight. I took it properly and lost 8 pounds the first month. I feel LESS bloated and much less hungry now.

I am on my second bottle of Garcinia Combogia and only thing I have noticed is gaining weight since I started.It hasn't changed my appetite to eat less or more, just I feel bloated and have gained about 7lbs..I don't recommend this pill to anyone due to my experience.I wasted ALOT of money on this because thinking of it as a fruit I purchased 3 bottles and got 2 free...NEVER will I do this again...

I've been taking the Garcinia Wow! Dietary Blend for several days. It has given me severe headaches, reoccurring hiccups, stomach cramps, gas, bloating, skin itchiness all over and now tonight I am so sick that I keep falling asleep even though I slept for 9 hours last night. I have not felt this bad in a very long time. I couldn't concentrate and was trying to write something and could not spell even my name correctly. Grateful for spell check on here. I am confused and dizzy to the point of passing out and my eyesight keeps going black and then fuzzy. I feel like I have been run over by a Mac truck. Also, my sugar is always normal and it was 168 for no apparent reason (I only checked it because I felt so bad I thought it might be low). I do not recommend this product to anyone. Nothing else in my diet or medications has changed which is why I know that this product has to be the cause of all these problems. Also, I had no change for the better in energy levels or appetite control. I had been taking ACE and it was working great, I was hoping this would work as well because the price is so much cheaper, but I am going back to my ACE pills that don't make me sick and help with appetite control and energy increase without any bad side effects. Truly, if you want a pill to help with your diet and exercise program I recommend ACE. It works. I have lost 20 ponds in 1 month with them.
Was making me have headaches and nevousness...anxious

This product is another fake drug item. We all want to eat very well and take a pill and lose weight. Garcinia Cambogia is another fake item. (I wonder about Dr. OZ)To lose weight you need to reduce food consumption and excerise.
I can see no change in weight however the accelerator seems to give me energy

1234 Garcinia Cambogia 1500mg will help you loose belly fat.  For me it does have to be the brand and milligram i stated above.  The company that was on the Dr. Oz show is not what you should purchase.    I recommend  purchasing it from a Health Food store because any milligram less is probably why it has been ineffective.  It does increase your energy level, does not cause constipation as so many other products do because of fiber, etc.  I highly recommend the product i listed.

Took 1st capsule 30 mins. before meal. An hour after had palpitation. Probably contains caffeine which I get headache and palpitation if taken too much. I think I have to stop and return this product.

I took Garcinia Cambogia this product for the first time tonight. After drinking the proper amount of water and waiting an hour as directed, I had a meal and felt especially full. It was big but not a huge meal. My stomach began to hurt and then I got bad gas and gas cramps. Lovely! I also felt a bit jittery and slightly "OFF." Now I have heartburn! I purchased this from Walmart and it is called Ultimate  Garcinia Cambogia, by Phytogenix Laboratories, in the yellow and orange box. Label says made in USA and it is 60% HCA. I did NOT get the one with added green coffee, as I am sensitive to stimulants. I am so glad that I only took 2 of the recommended 4 caplets! Returning this tomorrow. My own weigh loss has been going along fine (no rush)and so once again slow and steady may win the race. I went on line to search for reviews and found similar side effects listed. I would not recommend this product. Read the reviews first and decide. I searched Web MD.

I have fibromyalgia. I have been taking a brand of garcinia cambogia that has nothing it in but a little potassium.  It has 60% HCA, and is manufactured in the U.S.  I have lost weight, but it has also made a big difference in my energy level. keeps my appetite in check, ad helps with my every day ache and pains! Another very good result is that before taking the supplement, my cholesterol was 235, and now it is 198!  Live enzymes normal.  Its all in the brand...

I am not able to comment on the effectiveness of the treatment yet.  I too was scammed as the previous person by the same co.  I caught them at their game.  They ship more than 30 days of the product and bill you.  I immediately called them and got an RMA and returned the amount over the free 30 day trial.  They were not happy with my return, but they were going to bill me before I had a chance to see if the product was effective.  I'm reporting them to the BBB.  BUYER BE WARE!  I hope to write a review on how effective this is in the future.  This probably isn't the proper forum for this type of comment. The Co. does not put their name on their packaging

The product and the company is a joke. It's not hard to use but it does nothing. I did not lose any weight while using this product. The company in which I ordered my product also had the worst customer service I have ever experienced. They would lure customers in with a free trial only to then charge you $80 two weeks later if u didn't cancel and return that same bottle they gave u for the free trial. It makes no sense. If they were actually confident about their product they would offer a 'real' free trial and have faith the customer would re order their product if they saw results. The way they conduct their business is sneaky and dishonest. I highly recommend not to waste your time or money.
Ive only taken 1 dose just got it today.

If you buy the correct garcinia cambogia, you will have positive results, I have been using this product for 7 months and so far lost 42 pounds but my main goal was my health, I was taking 9 medications a day t treat high blood pressure, cholesterol, and diabetes, right now I'm off diabetes medication, also off cholesterol medication andhave cut down on my blood pressure meds. My doctor is speechless with my progress and is actually recommending this product to other patients, so far I went from 9 medications a day to 5. I plan to stay on it with a goal of one day be able to be meds. free, also by loosing weight and reducing the amount of pills I was taking I got rid off my erectile dysfunction. Nothing but good things I have to say about Garcinia but please buy from a good quality product, you get what you pay for.
column14: 35-44 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: I did lose about 10 lbs since Nov, 2013 but have acquired this cough and they can find nothing that would cause it so am wondering if maybe it is this Garcinia Cambogia
I have actually continued to gain weight while on this.

First, make sure it has 50% HCA and no fillers, binders, artificial ingredients (think veggie capsules).  Dr. Oz claims you don't have to diet or exercise but I'm not sure if that would work.  I started eatng less calories & I exercise 20 minutes/day, 3x per week. I did notice that the garcinia cambogia does supress my appetite and it actually helps me stay regular.  It also has serotonin which helps emotional eaters.  For those who claim to eat less & exercise more & not losing weight, it doesn't make sense because even if they are not using any supplements they should be losing weight by the mere fact that they are eating less & exercising more.  So they are either not being honest or not really watching their caloric intake. There are caloric intake calculators that will give you the amount of calories to consume in order to lose weight.  The Garcinia Cambogia helps to suppress appetite & lose fat.  According to Dr. Oz, your scale may show an increase due to muscle gain so make sure you try on clothes or take your measurements. I always base my weight loss on my measurements & not the scale.

Upon seeing this on Dr. Oz I took GC for just over two months and no weight-loss occurred, I only wanted to lose 5-10 pounds but I lost nothing. I also decreased my food intake to where I was satisfied but not stuffed, which is how I would usually eat before. Two symptoms I noticed were that It was harder to pass bowels, normally I would do so every other day but while taking GC it was very hard and came more infrequently. The other side effect that I noticed were very extreme menstrual cramps, I have never had bad cramps before I would maybe take one Ibuprofen on the first day and that was it, but while taking GC I had three very bad periods, my cramps were so extreme each time that I was literally sick and vomiting because the cramps were effecting my entire body. I will never take this again nor will I ever recommend someone to take it.

took Garcinia along with Green Tea Extract.   Wanted to lose 20-25 lbs. Took twice a day for two months. Did not want to take pills in the evening due to sleep issues. Exercised by walking 2-3 miles 3x's a week. Did not lose any weight whatsoever. Think the pills are a scam! Otherwise -- what am I doing wrong that is preventing me from losing ANY weight!
I have gained 5 Lbs since taking this. I exercise every day for over an hour and have not changed my diet .This product sucks.

Have been taking for 8 weeks & it's keeping my appetite in check.  I regularly exercise & eat well but have a hard time in the afternoons with snacking & this has helped whether it's mental or the product.  Has brought me into my goal weight, only losing 5 lbs which is all I was looking for.

Currently about 2 weeks into the treatment.  Haven't monitored, by scale, weight loss, but girth is diminishing slowly.  No negative effects to report.  Have radically cut back on my food intake.  Helps to reduce the evening cravings, and helps me to moderate my initial desire for food when I'm at the table

I usually do not attempt to use "fad" products.   This one sounded beneficial so I tried it... a week into taking it I experienced severe abdominal cramping/extreme loose bowel movements/vomiting/ and rectal bleeding that continued for 3 days     NEVER AGAIN!!!!   a series of medical tests found no medical condition/illness to explain symptoms.   upon stopping usage of Garcina I have not had any such recurrence.    I would rather be overweight than in hospital or worse.   Scariest event in my life to date.

it does not work tried to get my money back and they won't refund my money even though I sent the product back. they will not accept return to sender when you do not pay for shipping just another kimick to get your money
On the third day i started to bleed out of my rectum. I haven't read anyone having that issue as of yet. So i stopped taking them.

It never affected my weight or fat storage. I ended up having side effects like nausea, headache, and most frightening, rapid heart palpitations. All of those symptoms left when I stopped taking the pills.

I have  been on this for approximately six months.  I have had a terrible heart burn for approximately that long.  I did not put the two together but have noticed that if I forget to take the pills (in the last two weeks) it is better the next day.  I am also having a hard time sleeping and if I don't take the pills, I sleep well after a couple days.  I never missed until the last two weeks.  I have lost about five and a half pounds but I can lost more than that by just dieting.  I am going to stop completely.  I really need to be able to sleep.  I am also tired of living on the tums.  My husband thinks that the choking so often may have something to do with this also.  I have never done that before and I am constantly choking.

Well is been like 3 weeks that I been taking this pills and yes I have notice that my appetite has decreased but yes I get alot of headaches and I feel dizzy to, I have lost so far like 3 pounds .  The pills that im taking is the whole body .
180 pills with 50% Hydroxcitric Acid three 3 times a day...
Ive been on Garcinia for 2 wks lost 3 pounds however feel like im in a fog all day muscles feel week.  Have been sleeping more than im awake.

This treatment made me gain weight. I had my thyroid taken out and am on  synthroid replacement...When I took garcinia I ended up with a very dangerous thyroid level and was admitted to the hospital after collapsing on the floor.

I'm a post-menopausal female - been unable to lose an ounce for years. So far, 8lbs in 10 days! The trick seems to be... constant intake of water, throughout the day, and only serving myself 1/3 of what I normally eat. (I'll eat a larger portion out of habit - but if it's not in front of me, a much smaller amount will satisfy)

I recently used garcinia cambogia from Puritans Pride for a month.  I didn't realize at the time, but it was causing severe back pain in my kidney area, bowel movements up to 7x per day, very low energy, severe hair loss, some headaches and generally a feeling of being unwell, but I forced myself to keep going.  when I found this website and a number of people with similar symptoms, I IMMEDIATELY stopped taking the product and my symptoms disappeared. I am waiting for my hair to fill in again.

I bought a bottle of the recommended dose and took it just like the bottle said. On WEEK 5 I had lost no weight. In fact I feel as though I gained weight due to the medicine causing me to become bloated. The entire time I was taking this I felt miserable but a week after stopping the medicine I started feeling better.

Using garcinia has been a positive experience for me.  First of all, garcinia should not be used if its contents contain calcium as this diminishes its effectiveness.  A pure 100% garcinia extract product should contain potassium to assist the metabolism in its function and at least 60% HCA with no fillers.  When using garcinia to aide in weight control as is being touted in the media, one should keep in mind that the product is to be taken at least 30 minutes prior to eating a meal.  Water, coffee, tea consumption is important.  Portion control is the key factor in any diet modification program.  There is NO miracle pill available to slough off unwanted fat: people must take control of intake and exercise.
column14: 65-74 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: 56 years old. 6'2, 270 lbs. Took for a month. Product label suggested taking 30 minutes prior to largest meal of the day. Too pills for about one month. No weight loss. Possible side effects: Some headaches. One time severe headache with nausea. May or may not have been caused by this product. Did notice a reduction in appetite (fullness) after taking the pill. Without any weight loss, there is no reason for me to continue with the product - especially considering the possible side effects (which have gone away since I discontinued the product).
Some nausea light headed at times

I have lost about 3-5 lbs a week.  I don't feel hungry, I don't feel like snacking and I have energy.  I know this is working for me.  This is the only thing that has worked for weight loss for me.  It is incredible.

After taking for 4 weeks I had no results at all. I did not lose any weight,did not have increased energy and was disappointed in the product. I only wanted to lose my belly fat from menopausal time but found this product to be useless!

After reading others reviews, I'm  not sure I want to continue Garcinia. One person said she is taking 3 capsule twice daily...I think you're only supposed to take one twice daily.Another said he was eating only 1000 Calories a day, anyone can lose weight on that amount of calories. Hope everyone monitors their blood pressure & Liver Function. Stop any drug or Supplement that gives you negative side effects. I'll give it a decent try and hopefully get my $$$ back if it doesn't work for me.

Bought this for my 19 yr. old daughter, who has been trying to lose weight.  Purchased PREMIUM PURE GARCINIA CAMBOGIA.  The first week of use she began with Diarhea, and stomach cramps.  It was very uncomfortable.  We purchased from this company in December, but didn't start until the beginning of January.  This company only has a 30-day money-back guarantee, while most others have 60 days or longer.    Needless to say, I did not get my money back.  SAVE YOUR MONEY...  Also, there was absolutely no weight loss, just pain.
This product caused me intense stomach pain from gas. Would never recommend it to anyone. It hurt. Stay away from this stuff

I am taking flecainide, a sodium channel blocker, because of my history of atrial fibrilation.  I find that taking garcinia seems to lower my afib treshold; in other words, i am having breakthrough episodes of afib, usually during the late afternoon or during the night.  I'm not sure why this happens, but I've stopped taking garcinia and since that time, I've had no more breakthrough episodes.

I have tried 2 forms of garcinia cambogia. the first was a gummy chew that did nothing after 3 weeks so I bought next phytogenix ultimate. the first one was 750 mg per dose and 50% and the 2nd one was a tablet 60% perserving and 1556mg.I lost no weight peed a lot but did find that my cloths fit better for some reason. I had no side effects other than the peeing. I did my research but after a month I expected to see some results. I think this might work for a few but it seems the more I read or talk to people who use this the more I see most have no to little results. the the mirical it claims to be dr oz isnt relieable it seems I eat healthy and take in aprox 850-1000 cal per day Im 59 and weigh 242lbs I want to loose 60lbs and been unable to do so for the last 8 years that Ive been trying dr has no clue why i cant loose weight  My advice don't bother save your money doesnt seem to work for most

I haven't lost weight, but haven't gained either.  It does cause diarrhea, which can feel like you are not keeping food.  I haven't read about any negative side effects, but wonder if diarrhea can cause needed nutrients to be lost.

Though there is no sugar or carbohydrates, after taking the first pill, immediately raised my blood sugar over 240. I am on Atkins style diet and in ketosis but this pill -after only one-knocked me out of ketosis. Blood sugar remained high for 2 days. Unable to figure out how or why this could happen!  Unable to continue on it
I have taken both the 50% and 60% preparations and various manufacturers.  I have lost 45 pounds out of the 100 I have been working on losing for 6 months.
column14: 45-54 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Obesity

column6: After 30 days of taking Garcinia cambogia, I had heavy menstrual bleeding that continued for 7 days until I stopped taking Garcinia.  In a couple of days the bleeding stopped.  I restarted taking the Garcinia for 2 days and started bleeding again so I immediately stopped.  I am a 55 year old post menopausal women and will not take Garcinia again.  I did feel as if I lost a lb or 2 but the side effects were definitely not worth it and sent up red flags!
IÂ´ve been taking the pills for two weeks and I Â´ve not seen results, actually IÂ´m feeling more hungry
