product for week did not lose any weight with exercise.
I started a week ago on pure garcinia cambogia extract and also changed my diet to more healthy options - salads and the like. I have lost 3.5 kilos (a bit under 8 pounds)so far. No side effects.

I have found this product to be effective at "maintaining" my weight. I say this because in the past, when I would "be bad" and go on a binge for a few days, I would gain a lot of weight/pounds. I have clearly noticed that when I do the same now (binge), I gain very little/no weight! Also, the little that I do gain during my binges, drops off quickly/back to normal once my binging is over. I hope to see now, if it (Garcinia Cambogia) will actually help me lose my normal weight!
I did not see any difference and when I stopped taking the product I gained more weight.
do

I take two caps daily. I am hoping that this will help me with weight loss. Thus far I see no loss in weight, however It does create a slight curbed appetite. I will give this a fair chance to be effective.
What I read about Garcinia to loose weight, was you didn't particular need to be on a diet to accomplish this. I don't feel I overeat and don't eat much meat and no fat! But I haven't lost in a year!
column14: 75 or over | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: Only thing it did for me was cost me $$$ and make me REAL regular.
no effects at all No weight loss no loss of appetite

I used Garcinia Cambogia for almost 3 months. Near the end I noticed that some of my air was coming out on each side of my "temple", and even more disturbing I had what I call "light colored splotches" that were lighter than my skin. I am a black woman. I called an attorney and he told me that it would be a hard case to fight. So I called the company that I purchased it from and they were NOT sympathetic at all. In fact, they could care less. I have been off of this now for almost 3 months, but I had to use skin supplements to bring the color back to my ski. It was so bad on my forehad that I had to "hide" the reddish pink looking spots by wearing "bangs", OR putting on a cap to keep it from being noticed. Thank god, most of it is now gone. Beware of this product....I am still treating it..
I've lost 17 lbs in the past 3 weeks using this and modifying my diet.
after one month, no change in weight or stomach fat. pain in my kidney, excessive urinating. However did seem to curb my appetite, somewhat. not for me.
I stupidly fell victim to all the hype. Got my bottle, weighed myself, took it for a month. I did not change eating habits, as stated, in the end I had gained 3 pounds.  Not happy.  Waste of money

I have been taking Pure Garcinia Cambogia Extract (Wellki) for three months now.  I take it 30 minutes before I eat twice a day with several other supplements - Pure Green Coffee Bean Extract 800mg (Bio Nutrition), Just Raspberry Ketones 500mg (Buckeye Nutritionals)and Pure and Potent Moringa 800mg(Genesis Today).  I would also make sure that I always ate a healthy balanced breakfast and if I didn't have time for breakfast I would drink a protein shake.  I lost the first 25 lbs within the first two months.  I then added in exercise to the mix at least 4 days a week and have now lost a total of 45 lbs.  I make sure that I drink plenty of water throughout the day.  I have gone from 223 lbs. down to 178 lbs.  I have now added a Fitbit into the mix to track how much activity I get everyday.  It has worked well for me with no know side effects.  I am even off of my gout medicine with no flare ups as of yet!
I've been taking Garcinia along with a green cleanse formula have noticed only a couple pound decrease in two months of usage.
Took for about 3 weeks before side effects started.....which was bladder bloating, urinating constantly.....increased urge to urinate.  THese side effects subsided after I stopped taking pills.

I have been taking it for about two weeks now in combination with a low calorie diet. I have lost about 2.5 lbs which is what I normally would lose on a low calorie diet in two weeks, so I can't attribute the weight loss to the Garcinia product.
WARNING! DO NOT BUY GACINIA DIET MAX!! TOTAL SCAM! will charge you HUNDREDS of pounds but say they are charging you Â£1.99!!! DO NOT BUY

I've seen a bunch of reviews for 30-45 year olds, which is fine, but what about someone who's late 20s?    I've read a few reviews regarding a garcinia cambogia 1600 from mncpremium, and that's where I started looking at garcinia due to the oversize serving - I prefer "to the max" when it comes to all things health.    Is it easy to use? Absolutely.  A couple capsules a day is easy to take about an hour before I could eat.  Does it work?  I normally have a giant appetite because I'm a fairly active guy.  It does seem to curb that as long as I stay consistent with it - at 3-4 pills a day is 2400-3200mg, which again is the high end of recommended dosages.    Am I satisfied?  I wasn't expecting miracles, so I'm fairly satisfied.  I'm anxious to try a yacon extract as an overall healthier alternative based on the clinical research.  I just re-ordered garcinia cambogia 1600 so I'll give that another ~3 weeks to try, then I'll give their yacon exract a shot.      I'm really trying to burn off the bottom of my abs, so I'm not overly fat or anything, just looking for a 12 pound push to my optimal weight.

I just started taking it. The main reason was that it's supposed to stop fat storage and curb hunger. So far I'm not hungry. Living in the far north the darkness and the depression it cases can be overwhelming. So, I comfort eat. That is why I started this. To help so when i do work out I'm not fighting an uphill battle. There were a few different products on the shelf and I grabbed the one with the most per serving and taking it as directed. If your worried about liver or kidney's I would say to drink plenty of water. I kept track of how much I drink and it comes out to about 2 1/2 qts. a day. Plain water. Sometimes I squeeze in lemon and throw in some REAL cherries or grapes for taste. Anyway, so far this is doing as promised.

Ive read the positive and negative reviews in regards to this product. Anyone that didnt research before start their regiment only has their self to blame. I prepped for any side effects. You should start with a good fiber supplement, (psyllium). No cramps or pains. Little gas but the fiber can cause that.

I have been taking Garcinia Cambogia for three weeks. I have been taking 6 tablets a day with each tabletconsists of 10 mcg of Chromium and 500 mg of Garcinia Cambogia extract (50% hydroxycitric acid). During my first week I had lost 6 lbs but since then I have not seen any significant weight loss. What I have been experiencing is a reduction in appetite and vivid dreams. Normally I cannot remember my dreams but after the second week I experience at least one or more dreams that are in color and sometimes wake me up. They are not unpleasant dreams.
I am taking the Garcina Cambogia 50%HCA and am working out and watching what I am eating and I have not seen any significant difference.
I'm 51 Year old woman weight 300 it has been very hard for me to losse. So I'm going to try this its my 1st day  January 13 2014

Effective product. Sorry I didn't read the reviews 1st. The pain in my kidneys after 1 week of using this supplement was beyond words. I stopped taking it 3 days ago and the pain is still lingering. My advice, is stay away, the negatives far outweigh the benefits.     The product I used was Garcinia Cambogia complex from vitality medical 60% HCA 1300mg
I gained 3 lbs in a week had nausea , and constipation.
Have taken for 3 weeks and only thing it does is cause bloating and constipation.  Not worth the money....
It causes bloating and excess gas
I paid for the product 4 weeks ago and still have not received it

I took GC from Whole Body Research. I took for about 1 month with no weight loss. I returned the remaining 2 bottles and received a full refund. The bad news is the severe side effects, as described by others on this sight. Stomach cramps, nausea, back pain. I have had ultra sound n nuclear test for gallbladder, endoscopy for stomach all negative. Blood work shows elevated liver enzymes. I didn't associate GC with my symptoms until some directed me to this sight. I will be calling my DR. tomorrow.
ii took these for one and half bottles and found no weight loss occurring. they made me feel so uncomfortable - bloated with reflux/ heart burn.
I take heart meds, will this mix with them or cause a potency problem

column6: My goal was to lose 43lbs.  I started working out and keeping my calories under 2,000 per day.  I lost 32lbs through old fashion exercise, but wanted to get some help with the last 10-11lbs, so I bought the Pure Garcinia 60% HCA.  it's been 10 days and I've managed to average 1800 calories per day and continued my exercise regiment only to gain a pound.  Now, my wife had the same experience. she wanted to lose 18lbs, lost 11lbs and started taking the pills and she kept her calories the same approx. 1300 per day and she has gained 2lbs...we used the product as suggested and it doesn't work...

Used this product for 4 weeks, combined with an exercise plan... working out 5 - 6 days a week:  Cardio 30 min, weight training 30 min and yoga/pilates.  I am currently 40 pounds overweight.  I have not lost a single pound.  I don't eat junk food and limit the amount of breads and sugars in my diet.   This product is a bunch of hype.  So disappointed.  Going back to a low-carb diet where I lost 7 pounds in 2 weeks.

Have taken this for 5 weeks.  My  hair started thinning on crown  2 weeks ago so that my scalp shows.  Don't know if  this is related to the pills but they are the only change in my diet.  Have not lost any weight by taking 2 pills/day

Do not bother taking a chance on this product! I hate to sound cliche'but lose weight the old fashion and most effective way; diet and exercise. I was only on this for 3 days when on the 3rd day I had awful, awful chest pains and couldn't move! I def thought it was a heart attack...all symptoms matched. I took a Bayer aspirin and husband called an ambulance! Long story short; this product can cause severe acid reflux and at times, the capsule doesn't dissolve fast enough causing it to be settled in the esophagus area. I always drank a ton of water after taking the capsules but this still happened. From everyone I know trying this product, they all have the same complaints-severe acid reflux, no weight loss and migraines/headaches. Be very careful, the feeling that I was having a heart attack was the most horrible and scary thing I've ever went thru in my life!
column41: awful, awful chest pains, severe acid reflux, migraines, headaches

column6: Just started taking this today- 70% HCL....looking to see how it works...After reading all 261 reviews it seems that is works better and is more effective with less negative side effects for younger age groups...maybe it works better with a younger metabolism...anyway- I took my dose(by accident with lunch instead of before) and 3 hours later I am still full...like Thanksgiving full! I ate 3/4 cup of WW soup and 3/4 cup of WW chicken salad....STILL FULL!!! Will keep posting about weight loss!
WITH diet AND exercise, this product works. Don't overeat because you think it is burning the fat. The HA can only work if you aren't adding significantly more fat to your body.
I lost 5 pounds in 3 weeks and pleased with the results thus far.     (with 60% HCA)
This treatment has not helped me one bit. If fact I've gained weight.
It is the easiest way that I have found to lose weight..15# so far and no ill effets

ok I am not over weight BUT just had a few pounds that needed help GOING AWAY...  technically this doesnt seem to "get rid" of weight...it increases the seratonin and, in easier terms, makes you happy so therefore you eat less!  it seemed to be working! Ive been in a better mood since taking Garcinia & would say ive lost a couple pounds in about a month (which I feel is pretty healthy).  BUT....i stopped taking it for about 2 weeks....and my mood and demeanor seemed to change in a snap. I was super depressed feeling & would start crying for no reason...being a woman that tends to come monthly :) BUT i was not even near that time of the month.  im associating my mood swing/change with the Garcinia because about a week into taking it again, i bounced back....it was weird.  BUT not weird enought to get me to stop taking it.  all in all I like what this product does. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs/wants to drop those few extra pounds, but I would also tell my side effects story.
column41: super depressed feeling, would start crying for no reason

column6: I did a some research on fat loss over the internet last summer and gave it a try for a little over a month, and I lost about 10 lbs. I also altered my diet to lean proteins more fruits and veggies no processed carbs, and worked out 3 to 4 times a week for an hour. It can help with a change in lifestyle. It really helped with my cravings for sweets.

Great results..Reading all posts makes me wonder if what so have taken isnt filled with fillers. It makes all the difference in the world. Dr. OZ does not sponser any one product, he just stated what to look for so you dont waste your money. 1. NO FILLERS 2. CONTAIN POTASSIUM 3. TAKE BETWEEN 1500-3000 MGS. 30 MINUTES BEFORE MEALS.  IF YOU FOLLOW THESE GUIDLINES IT WORKS!!!!!! AGAIN NO FILLERS
No noticeable weight loss and terrible, terrible gastric reflux, I am going to stop taking them, it's been 9 days.
I have taken 5 bottles and have not loss any weight or inches at all . I buy this at The Vitamin Shoppe $15-$17.00 per bottle. 100 capsules. This does not work !!!!!

I have been taking Garcinia Cambogia Extract for 11 days and have lost 3lbs. I feel so much better from my stomach, I do not feel as bloated as I used to and I will continue to take it for at least one month. Just curious how effective it is and how much I will lose. I have not excersied at all, I have cut down my portions when I eat and am trying to eat more healthy,veggies, salads drinking more water etc.
I took 3 capsules 1 hr before each meal for two months and never lost a pound or noticed any change in the way my clothes fit. Completely ineffective.

It is another BOGUS product.  I tried it for a month, along with green coffee extract, and did not lose any weight.    It also caused acid reflux!  I used "Research Verified" brand but don't see it listed below.

Finished one bottle taking exactly as directed, whilel exercising 3 days a wk, and eating 3 very small meals a day.  I have gained 10 more pounds.  Lab results show enzyme levels of liver have risen, which is cause for alarm.

I have been using gc for just under a month and have already lost 17# I .Take . In the morn 30.Minutes before breakfast and eat oatmeal every morning, granola for snacks And then . 60  Minutes before dinner which in turn I do eat a lot less, I also don't but the expensive stuff online $10 bottles at Walmart . ....... no side effects .....

I just order this product from amazon. After seeing it over and over on fb and talking to many customers that have called me to dispute charges on their credit card account (I work for a bank) I did some research myself. I looked at so many websites that offer this and always checked the TERMS link at the BOTTOM of the page. I seen that almost all of the websites offering this for a low 4.95 for shipping clearly say in their terms and conditions that YOU WILL be on a monthly renewal after 14 to 18 days and will not be able to cancel it until you have received a 3 month auto shipment of this product at a mere 79.99 a month I decided to order from amazon. After all there is no monthly renewal or extra info to search for on their website. I found a product that has 180 pills for just 21.99 was shipped and received within 2 business days per amazon prime (in which I also read the terms and conditions and am fully a wear that by giving them my cc# I will be charged 79.00 a year) I am so far happy with the product. I have only been on it for 2 days and feel pretty good. As far as weight loss I have no clue yet to attest to if it works or not. But I have not been as hungry and feel pretty good as far as not be to tired after working 11 hours today. We will just have to wait and see how it works for me. Im just happy I know how to navigate web pages and have enough smarts to look into what Im signing up for before I give all my info to some so called great offer. I hope that what anyone and everyone takes from this remark is to take the time to review what your signing up for and don't be surprised if you don't do your reached that you might get taken for a whole lot more then the so called 4.95 shipping and handling.

I was using both garcinia and green coffee extracts. I felt queasy and I did lose some weight.I was losing approx. 1 lb per day but the diarrhea and queasiness makes this un acceptable for me. My main issue came with the fact that the online avenues tried to suck you into a monthly program. When I called to cancel my 15 day trial period They tried to make me ship back the extra they sent at my expence. They spouted off about the terms and conditions but I let them know that I didn't buy anything other than pay shipping for a free trial and that if they wanted the product they would need to send me the prepaid shipping label and box to return it with as the terms and conditions only mentions returns for refunds. The guy then cancelled both trials with confirmations and said that if I were unwilling to ship back at my own expense that there was nothing they could do. Don't get sucked in. If this product works for you go to your local GNC and get it for a third of what the internet sites are trying to charge.
Weekly for 6 months.  Waste of money.
column14: 55-64 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: Helped me lose my stomach fat.
column14: 75 or over | less than 1 month | Weight loss

column6: Bad product, I been taking it for over a month and no weight loss. Also, they would not refund my money after one month of use. Stay away from this product.

was not looking for a quick fix - i usually don't fall for gimmicks - but i trusted dr oz recommendiation - this supplement initially gave me more energy, and i could control my appetite better.  Now i have been taking for 2 weeks straight and my body achs, trouble sleeping even when i take my ambian, broke out in a rash, became irritable
does not work as advertised

I bought one product that had calcium added to only read on another site that you need to not have calcium to make it really work. Both have failed me and I have not lost any weight. The one with the calcium did give me migraines, and one without didn't. In both cases I am very dissapointed. I will give this another week and then send it back. Better off doing low carb and South Beach I lost 12 lbs in a month! I only need to loose about 10 lbs post baby weight, but would love to drop another 15-20. I currently weight 163 and am 5 feet 6 inches (size 6-8)

Been taking it for 3 weeks.  Have not lost one pound.  Have been sleeping more soundly, though.  Biggest problem is that my whole body has started to ache.  And my joints hurt.  I thought at first it was because of my workouts, which I had increased- but I stopped for a week and the pain is still there.  I just read on another website that is you are taking stati. Drugs for high cholesterol - which I do - it can exacerbate the negative effects of those drugs and cause muscle degeneration and joint pain.  Guess I will be stopping this supplement.
DON'T WORD BEEN USEING FOR 6 WEEKS
Didn't loose any weight, often had GI upset
Not had weight lost.  Have has decease in pant size, but not significant loss of belly fat.

I am just finishing my third week and at first had only had suppressed hunger.  I have dropped 3# this week so far.  Most of what I read before starting seemed to show that it was week 4 and 5 that you started really seeing change so I am excited for the next couple of weeks.  I have not seen any side effects (headache, dizzy, heart palpatations, etc.)  I feel more alert, sleeping better and have more energy.
I have been using this product for one week. Yes it suppresses your appetite but I have had a migraine for the entire week. Stopped taking it.....no headache. Not worth it.
I started taking this 3 weeks ago and have lost 15 lbs without doing anything else.

Have used for four weeks in conjunction with adherence to a balanced low calorie diet of about 300 for breakfast and 300 for lunch and 600 for dinner with a couple of 200 cal snacks. The GC has been great to help me stick to yhis plan. Went from 225.6 to 211.0 so far.

I started taking 1600mg a day of GC. 800mg 30minutes before lunch with 10oz of H2O, and repeated for dinner. With regular exercise an hour a day, 20minute cardio and light weight lifting 5X a week.... One month later lost weight but the fat was gone no muffin top. My stomach went down with no extra skin because of the cardio and sit ups. I went from size 13 pants to size 9. From XL to a size M! 160 pounds to 140 in 1 month and 1/2 with healthy eating of course. But I did eat pizza at times but got full quickly and it really grossed me out. It does work wonders but exercise is critical. At least running to the point were you know you can't push it. My sister started taking it 2 weeks ago with no exercise and you can tell she looks less bloated and muffin top is going away. Size 15 pants to size 13. Shes happy. The GC pills are 60% extract with no added ingredients . We bought them at walmart by pharmacy section. 9$ we buy 10 at a time because they run out fast!!!

I bought mine from Whole Body Research. I have only taken it for 5 days. No weight loss, but didn't expect any in 5 days. I will stop taking it, however, because it makes me feel just terrible. I have had severe headaches, neck pain, shortness of breath, and some chest pains. I also feel so foggy in the head that I can't stand it.
column41: severe headaches,neck pain,shortness of breath,chest pains,foggy

column6: I have been taking this product for 3 weeks and have had no weight loss at all, actually gained weight...very disappointed
Heart burn and indigestion after two weeks; lost only 2 pounds; not worth the discomfort.
Caused rash, hives and itching of neck, arms and legs.  Had to discontinue supplement.
Have been using garcina cambrogia select for over a month and have not loss any weight
I took this garcinia cambogia 1500mg 60% HCA (1234) about two weeks... no results :(

Cut cravings, reduced blood sugar by 40 points the first week. Increased my matabolism, gave me energy. Caused a slight increase in blood pressure but not significant to cause alarm. Reduced edems in feet and allowed me to sleep through the night. Weight loss has been slow but size reduction has been sihnificant. One dress size in a month and 10 pounds od body weight. Excesise is needed.

After approx. 1-2 weeks of use taking 30 min. before each meal I started having a low-grade headache and a burning sinus drainage down the back of my throat.  I discontinued use to see if I got better.  My symptoms improved, but just to be sure after about two months I tried it again with the return of all the same symptoms.  I do believe that I lost a few lbs. but not worth the symptoms.

I started taking this product 3 weeks ago and have lost 8 lbs so far. I take it 30 minutes before meals and by the time meal time arrives i'm not hungry. I've been eating less overall and find myself happier and with more energy. I have not had headaches or any negative side effects. Overall very pleased with this supplement!!
This is day one of taking it . I feel terrible and find myself eating just to try to make this gross feeling go away . I will  not continue taking this product.
I have had joint pains, foggy, horrible stomach pain, it does however curb your appetite which is also not good because I couldnt eat anything and keep it down. Terrible experience for me.
I was taking G. Garcinia for a few days. I had headache, but it went away and I become constipated and then I stopped it. I have noticed weight loss. However, I was taking it once a day.

one month later down 16 lbs . no side effects noted.  minimal exercise .  supresses appetite and emotional eating cravings for fast food or junk food.  has worked well with a multi vitamin did not order online went to GNC and got product manufactured in u.s.  not china as some internet bottles have on labels.
column14: 25-34 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Other

column6: Ever since I have taken this, my feet and ankles are swelling terribly. I have always had skinny legs, ankles and feet, now they are twice as big as they should be. I also lost about 8 lbs at the beginning but on the third week it all came back. I think it would be in my best interest to stop taking this and see if the swelling goes out of my feet, ankles and legs. I have NEVER had this happen before with any drug I have taken.  I want to just send the remaining back. I see no point of continuing because the feet swelling is not getting any better, only worse and no weight loss now at all.

Bought product(GARCINIA WOW) from HEALTHY NEW BEGINNINGS, out of town when delivered, called after taking product for 9 days with no results but wouldn't refund money as they count the free trial from date of order not receipt of product.  Continued to take product since I couldn't return or get refund; it DOESN'T result in any weight loss.
I have had a few times when I have taken the pill, ate my food, and then threw it up.  Don't know if it's the garcinia cambogia or not.
Every day I have felt terrible while taking this product.  It has done NOTHING for me but make me feel bad!
head aches and weight gain. went in with positive thoughts, ate sensibly, daily walks, but started getting sick, and each day got worse. fogginess, bloating, not good, returning the product!
Was wanting to know if taking and extra few tablets of garcinia  a day would be harmful really need to lose 20kg fast!!  Wanting to hear peoples real story's too!! :)
I would be easier to save your money, it did nothing for me whatsoever

I took it as directed and after the 4th day I developed a lump in my throat. I have stopped taking it now for about 3 weeks and the lump feeling is still in my throat. I am now undergoing numerous test to figure out what is going on, Not only are the pills expensive, so are all the doctor visits, Specialist visits, and time lost from work! I am very unhappy and would not recommend this product to anyone, not even TEST RATS!!!

It definitely suppresses appetite. I am eating less and exercising, but have not noticed a difference after three weeks except that my arms are tighter. My age (51) probably does not help. I will stick with it a few more weeks to see what happens. I feel fine taking it. No side effects.
I used garcinia capsules for about a year with no weight gain. Also, garcinia aids in glucose control.
column14: 45-54 | 1 to less than 2 years | Weight loss

column6: Being 70 years of age, I cannot expect this to work as it would on a 20 year old.  However, with that said, I have taken three bottles of the Pure Garcinia Cambogia and the results are very disappointing.  All I am wanting is to lose 5-10 pounds- did not lose one pound.  I am thinking that half portions and exercise are still the only way to go.

I will never do this again! I took garcinia about 4yrs ago and had great success. Last year I tried again, along with some other supplements, and long story short I was getting tested for bladder cancer. Negative of course. I decided to try again, and started having urinary problems again. Thinking it was the other supplements I stopped those but it still persisted. Stopped the garcinia, yesterday and some of the symptoms subsided until late this morning. I had a horrible pain in the middle of my back left side, and I had to be seen right away. I was diagnosed with a kidney infection. I can't help to think the garcinia is related.

Definitely increased energy, improved mood. I have decreased appetite and have lost a couple lbs in first week. I have noticed I exercise more, probably because I have more energy and can tolerate increased physical activity. Using Pure and no side effects. Feel great. Craving less carbs.

I have been on this for about 4 -6 weeks now and have gained weight!!! Also, I am having terrible knee pain. I thought it was just a twist or something, but then I spoke with 3 others about the knee pain, they too were having new knee pain. We thought it might be we are getting a little older but then discovered we were all taking the same Garcinia product! Coincidence? Maybe, but we are all have stopped taking it. After 3 days, my knee is feeling better. I guess the best weight control program is exercise and eating right which for me would include portion control.

These pills were expensive and a waste money and time.  With a healthy diet and taking these pills actually increased my appetite and ended up gaining 8 lbs. in the first 3 weeks of taking.  I also experienced frequent headaches.  The headaches stopped after I stop taking these pills.
no real weight loss after 1 month of treatment,experiencing minor headaches and am very tired

When i took the pills as directed I started noticing really bad backpains. I stopped taking the pills and waited for the backpains to stop completely. This took about a week.I started taking the pills again and confirmed they were causing the back pains. I've sinced stopped the pills and have been fine. While the pills did crave my appetitie, the pain was more than I could bear.

I have really seen no results of weight loss in 3 weeks. I do not have headaches or problems sleeping but have had terrible constipation due to these pills. I think it is a waste of time and I think Dr. Oz needs to comment on this.
I have used this for two months and have not lost any weight.

I was so excited  Garcinia, but after taking it the first day I started experiencing a headache, I decided to stop taking it for a few days, and tried again only to have the lower part of the back of my head and neck pain. All the other reviews  seem not to  experience this, but I did research and found out one of the side effects was headaches, so now I just don't know what to do. I guess I'll just try the old fashion way. I guess at the end of the day it's ready the best way!
i guess i was duped  purchased the wrong product
column14: 65-74 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Other

column6: I have tried every product on the market, this supplement has done the best with appetite suppression as anything I have taken previously and with almost no side effects.  I am now 4 weeks into my use of this supplement and plan to continue using it for continued weight loss.

I am 70 years old, have always been in good physical shape but after double knee replacements 5 years ago, my exercise decreased tremendously.  I am on my third bottle of pure garcinia cambogia and have not seen any weight loss nor loss around the abdominal area.  I ordered my garcinia off the Dr. Oz website so that I had the correct product. Although I wrote several comments on the supplement's website, none were published since they were not positibe comments.

I have been using for about 10 weeks--used in concert with change of diet to no gluten, sugar, bad carbs--and with green coffee bean extract and it has been amazing...I consistently lose and i am getting to my goal of 30 pounds down--for health and well being.  i also have more energy, better clarity and feel and look great.  I like it.

My pants do not fit as tightly but I haven't lost any weight, in fact, I've gained. I think the fat must be turning to muscle or something.  I have had headaches and muscle pain in my hands/arms/legs. Not sure what to make of this product! I bought it at a natural foods store and it has 65% of the HA, so it's the real deal. Himalaya Pure Herbs, Garcinia from India. I take 2 pills at once but I'm supposed to take 1 pill twice a day. I can tell I'm not as hungry, mood has been very good yet this is discouraging. Dr. Oz said you don't have to exercise and will lose weight, but it's not happening for me. I will not do Insanity, as I have arthritis in my knees.  Knew it was too good to be true!!

I have been taking this daily for two weeks.  Been exercising and eating healthy, but have gained 7 pounds!  It could be all the gas and bloating I've been experiencing since I started taking it.  I've also been constipated and had several bowel movements in the same day!  Has made me really uncomfortable at work.  If i lost weight instead of gaining, I would continue, but I just can't tolerate the stomach pains any more.
no weight loss at all.
I went from 209 to 204 in 8 days. I seems to be working good. You have to take 4 pills three times a day with a glass of water each time 60Min before eating.

Much improved mood, less appetite, no side effects. Has helped me over the "hump" in dieting plateau.  Make sure you purchase pure product w/o fillers, etc. which may cause decrease in effectiveness or stomach upset.
column14: 55-64 | 6 months to less than 1 year | Weight loss

column6: I lost 4 pounds first week   more energy  no side effects
Took as directed for two and a half months with no results.
Slow process to lose weight, but worth it.
Nausea diarrhea heavy distasteful burping. Out of work for over a week. Not worth it!
I had insomnia, severe constipation, runny nose and headaches

I have taken this product for over 2 weeks.  Lost weight but then I am following Weight Watchers.  This is no secret weight loss pill.  It causes stomach upset, pain and diarrhea.  I will stop taking it.  No magic cure.  To lose weight you have to eat less and exercise.

I am sharing this post because I was taking GARCINA CAMBOGIA.. I lost 15 pounds in 3 months and then I went and had my check up my blood work came back with my Liver Enzymes very high. So I stop taking them. I think if you are taking them be sure to go have blood work done...
I feel great and I'm losing weight. I don't won't to eat so much like I use to. Plus my moods are great.

I am concerned about the HCA in Garcinia Cambogia and liver damage. Anyone else heard this?     Overall the product does curb appetite and an added bonus is, I think, it aids in sleeping. I get a good solid night's sleep. I went off the pills for 2 days, insomnia back, took the pills and great sleep, lots of dreams. For the sleep benefits I would rate this product A+. Weight loss, not so much, only 2 pounds in 3 weeks.

I started taking GC (Nature Wise brand) 6 weeks ago. Recently, I've started noticing rashes in all the creases of skin all over my body. It began on my wrist, and at first I thought it was an allergy to some jewelry, but now it's spread to my elbows, the backs of my knees, my armpits, and even my butt crack. Whenever I sweat the rash gets severely red, itchy, and irritated. Has anyone else had this problem?
I can not get to sleep at night. This keeps me tossing and turning all night with very little sleep.So much for more energy like they claim.

I notice a lot of heartburn that is quite uncomfortable. Stools seem to have more girth and appear to happen more regularly. I do not feel bloated and rarely feel hungry although I eat very little. In a month an a half I've only lost about 2 pounds. Not what I expected but still continuing to see if the results improve.

I have taken Garcinia Extract now for 3 weeks, and I have started to have symptoms of Interstitial Cystitis. I am very worried about this product causing damage to the bladder lining. I do not know for sure without going to my Dr. but I am not taking anymore.

I purchased 3 bottles and received two more as a free trial after seeing Dr. Oz's review of the product.   The nightmare with this product is that you get signed up with E Trim Trainer that charges your account $9.48 per month for an adviser fee and even after cancelling, they continue to bill your account.

I've been taking 1500 mg. a day for the last 5 days and I've never felt better.  I had no idea that it increases serotonin levels, but it sure has put me in a great mood the last 3 days.  My appetite has descreased and feeling fuller at night.  I am going to buy another bottle from Costco!

I purchased the product from Puritan's Pride. Reliable, honest, no hidden charges    ***Please do not get discouraged by the negative reviews. They are dissatisfied with the company, not the product.***    It's not a miracle pill. It won't make the fat "melt" off, especially if you're not following a sensible diet. I've been on it (give or take) 4 months, and I've been losing about 2-3 pounds a week. Not really over exerting myself or starving myself by any means. Again, sensible. Without the pill, I was losing about 1/2 to 1lb a week.    Use your brain and come up with your own conclusions :)

I hesitate to give 5 stars for effectiveness or satisfaction only because I've only been taking this supplement for 2 weeks.  However, in that time I've dropped 6 lbs. I've been exercising for a long time and this is just what I needed to jumpstart the weight loss again. I'm also following a food program (not a diet) that includes eating smaller, healthier meals every 2-3 hours. With the three things combined I truly feel I've found the answer to my problem. We need to stop dieting! I take this supplement with a multi vitamin and my energy levels are great! I have a renewed interest in being true to myself and my eating habits. No more huge plates of food. Eat a meal that can fit in the size of your palm - and eat one every three hours - and watch the fat melt away. I hope to come back here in 2 more weeks and award Garcinia that 5th star!!
Taken for 3 months No weight loss

I just started on Thursday so I wanted to check out some reviews about the product. I read reviews but I always take them in stride because EVERYONE is different. I have had no headaches or  gitters etc . I dont feel hungry but I love to eat, I find I am actually forcing myself to eat, I feel full but I just want to eat. Its mental :( I've also been reading that it matters which company you get it from. Dr. OZ does not suggest any companies, he only sets the guidelines i.e at least 50 HCA (higher is better)and 1000 mg etc. Read your labels, do your research and as always check with your Dr. first. Lots of people have pre-existing conditions that this product in its pure form will cause an adverse reaction. My cousin has tried two different types of this pill. With one she lost 3 lbs in one week and with the other she stil hasn't lost a single lb...infact she regained. I have a serious problem with food (mental) you know the Sea food diet? thats me...I SEE food and I want to eat it regardless if I am full or not. I am going into week 2 and will be trying harder to stop over eatting. Most people when they feel full they stop..not me. Will update again next week. Good luck.

I have been taking for a week.  Some tummy troubles, I feel like it is cleaning me out:). I have lots more energy and have lost 2 pounds since starting.  Appetite is definitely less.  Watching what I eat, including more veggies and fruits.  Will stick with it for a few more weeks unless more side effects occur.  So far so good, I feel like its working.
Took Garcinia Cambozia for 3 months hoping it would eventually work.  Weight steady +/- 2 or 3 lbs.  Started taking product.  Gained 7 lbs.  Unable to lose.

It's day number 2 of my garcinia experience and I've dropped 1.5lbs overnight. However, I did an insanity workout. I'm 5'3 and 22 years old and have been struggling with my weight (142). I'm hoping to get back down to my original size of 125. So far, I haven't had any cravings, headaches, or pain. The hardest part for me so far is that I'm either not hungry or to full to eat anything after taking my pill. My mind tells me it's unhealthy not to eat so I force myself to take a few bites. I'm wondering if this is the reason why people are losing so much weight.     Today I didn't have time to do my daily exercise so we'll see if I lose any weight tonight.     I'm taking Natures Plus Garcincia found at Health Hut for $23.00.

No significant weight loss - I have 25 lb left to lose - lost 65 before this. Hoping it would "jump start" me again but instead I have had stomach pain (not nausea, pain!), headaches and haven't felt like myself! I'm discontinuig this and continuing the old fashioned way - watching what I eat and exercising!!
I got mine at sams club. only been taking it a week but so far has worked good. need to lose about 50 lbs and so far have lost 4 lbs. no side effects... as of now.

I am a 28 year old big girl and I have been taking Garcinia Cambogia for a month now and lost a total of 24lbs. Now that I know it works I will be dieting and excercising  while taking Garcinia Cambogia to see if I get different results. And a little secret... I get mine from Wal-Mart
After taking garcinia cambogia as recommended for three weeks, I have not lost any weight; however, my blood pressure has shot through the roof.  I am discontinuing use of this product today.
column41: blood pressure shot through the roof

column6: I started taking Garcinia about a week ago.  After about 3 days of taking the pills, not only was I eating much more than before, I also started experiencing: shortness of breath, mild chest pain, severe leg cramps, headaches, disorientation and dizziness (yes, I was miserable).  At first I thought I was coming down with the flu, then I remembered the Garcinia.  I stopped taking it immediately, and 2 days later, the symptoms are gone.  Coincidence?  Possibly, but more likely related.  I'm not going to try taking it again.  So I can't speak about its effects on weight loss!  Looks like some people have had positive experiences, but I urge you to proceed with extreme caution.

Been taking 'Garcinia Trim 60%HCA' for almost a month now. The suggested use is one tablet(500MG) three times daily with full glass of water 60 minutes before each meal and not to exceed 6 tablets a day.      Pretty much I take one tablet around 8:10am, another at 10:30am-11:30am and sometimes I skip the third but if I do take it, I take it between 4pm-5pm.    So, this does help curb my appetite a lot. Days when I don't take it at all I find that my hunger pains are outrageous and in comparison, days I do take them I have no appetite nor hunger pains.    However, the mental 'fuzziness' i've seen in other reviews.. I've definitely experienced that. Some nausea/dizziness and on the verge of headaches. It's become pretty common towards later in the day but before I take third tablet. It sometimes feels like you can't concentrate/focus or that the light headedness makes it hard to perform basic stuff. I work in an office so usually i'm filing or at my computer. Being up on my feet and repeatedly bending over for files and such is not something I can do while one of these... 'episodes' persists(sensation of possibly passing out if moving too much). It's almost like your head is wanting to lull back(sometimes feels like 'the spins') or you can sometimes feel in your throat/chest area the sensation that you may want to vomit(never actually did). The chest/throat sensation... I can definitely see why others may perceive this as having troubles breathing.    Haven't noticed any sleeping issues although it may be because of the timing of when I take the tablets or lack thereof.      Conclusion: My full time job isn't very physically demanding so I can get away with dealing with the episodes that persist to an hour or two at most. While the side effects I have described may seem like enough to stop or pass on these, I have a high tolerance for pain/discomfort so against my better judgement I'll most likely continue to take these.

I took two capsules 1 hour before breakfast and my appetite was suppressed for the day. Your website reported side effects so I quit. As I had only taken 2 capsules I didn't think it would affect me. Fierce headache & fatigue started 24 hours later and ended about 1.5 days later.

I have a great immune system so thought this was very odd. I stopped using them and complained to the company. I also saw that another woman said her immune system was excellent but this also brought about something resembling a shingles rash as well. I learned my lesson, research, research, research. Thankfully I used a MC Gift card with only had enough left on it for the "free" patches pay only shipping and we will charge the card monthly for $69.00 per month thereafter. It contains Calcium 50 mg, Chromium 200 mcg (167% daily recommended, Potassium 50 mg, and Garcinia Cambogia 1000 mg.   I began having hot spells, difficulty in sleeping and after two weeks developed Shingles. I am usually a critic for these kind of things. However, I wanted to loose weight so bad and i gave this a shot. I like Garcinia Cambogia because its an ALL NATURAL SUPPLEMENT (not a miracle pill). By taking this pill, i had to work out and change my diet to make this fully effective. I followed the directions exactly, cut out all sugars, sweets, fried foods, milk and juice, and cut my meals to 3 times a day (less than 500 calories per meal) as well as working out 30 minutes of cardio morning and night (burpees, sit ups, jumping jacks and planks) and going to the gym for an 1 hour & 15 minutes 3 times a week (strength training, cardio and steamroom/sauna). I had a goal sheet from a tight size 46 to a size 36, within two months i was able to fit comfortably into a size 40 waist (and squeeze into a size 38), just in time for my vacation to California! I have done workouts like this before and failed in loosing weight, but with the combination of my routine and Garcinia Cambogia i was able to fast track towards my goal. It is quite amazing to be from 309 pounds to 265 pounds. The trick to loosing weight isn't about just loosing pounds quickly, its a lifestyle choice that YOU want to make. I didn't even realize i lost so much until i touched down to California and looked in the mirror after a shower. The next day i went to Nordstroms and bought all new clothing because the clothing I bought was too big!!! lol . Still got a ways to go before i can fit into my size 36 jeans thats hangning on my wall! To make a long story short, i recommend Garcinia Cambogia, but check with your doctor first if your a diabetic. If you are on it, make sure after 12 weeks you take a 2 week break off of the supplement, then you can continue back on the supplement afterwards. Good Luck and stay blessed!

I'm going to stop taking this supplement because it is causing extreme fatigue, dizziness and stomach discomfort. I agree, there hasn't been enough research on the effects or side-effects of this product. Caveat Emptor, let the buyer beware!

column6: I am a 48 year old male and i've had stones since i was in 2nd grade. I've probably passed a hundred stones in my lifetime from the size of grain of sand to a small bullet. For the last ten years or so I generally did not have the agonizing pain associated with stones, but it was replaced with a dull ache that would linger for up to a month and would be triggered by any kind of physical activity. Even walking through the grocery store would set it off. I had a cat scan and it showed 'multiple' stones (generally meaning too many to count) and one very large one that was sitting right at the base of the kidney and potentially move around and block urinary flow. I was going to have lithotripsy again but the doctor was going to force me to have a stent which i don't need due to the size of the stones i've passed my whole life. I bought Stone Breaker off of Amazon and it has literally changed my life. I don't even take it every day, just when I start to feel any kind of burning, pain or any kind of disruption with my urine. I never passed any stone fragments and my urine did not appear cloudy as some of the reviews claimed. All I can say is that the lingering ache that plagued me for years is now gone. I can't believe it's a coincidence. Not sure if it changes the PH of my urine or what. I would be very curious to have another imaging of my kidneys done to see if that large stone is gone or has shrunk in size. One of the very few times in life when I've been pleasantly surprised by a product like this.
